label: 藤原明衡
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?989-1066) Father of Atsumitsu and Atsumoto; grandfather of Chikamitsu, Shigeaki, and Yoshiaki. President of the court university and erudite" of literature. Tutor to the Crown Prince and RegentChancellor Fujiwara no Yorimichi. Comp. Honchō monzui, Honchō shuku 本朝秀句 ("Exemplary Couplets by Japanese Poets." ca. 1066). Wrote Meigō ōrai 明衡往来 ("Akihira's Correspondence," 1066; or Unshū ōrai 雲州往来, "Izumo Correspondence"), Shinsarugaku ki 新猿楽記 (ca. 1060). Other prose compositions in Sanjūgo bunshū and others. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (47), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (12), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集(10), and Wakan kensakushū (6). Waka in Goshūishuū, and Wakan kensakushū (1). [敦光、敦基、周光、茂明、令明、藤原頼通、本朝文粋、三十五文集、漢詩、和漢兼作集、和歌、後拾遺集] "
